column1: Visitation will be held on Tuesday June 23 from 4-8pm at Reasner Funeral Home 1515 Charles St. Wellsburg. Mass of Christian Burial will be Celebrated on Wednesday June 24 at 11:00am at St. John the Evangelist Church in Wellsburg Fr. Dan Pisano as Celebrant. Interment will follow at Franklin Cemetery in Wellsburg.
